ProductInfo.Features:
8 channel H.264 compression triplex CIF/HD1/D1 resolution real time DVR with 1500GB SATA hard drive. 8 channel video and 4 channel audio inputs
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation. Support iPhone Google Phone
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOON function. CIF: 200fps/8ch
Support the live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
Camera Feature: Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD sensor,700 TVL, Weatherproof aluminum housing, 9-22mm vari-focal lens,30 large IR LEDs, heavy duty bracket pan 360 degree tilt 90 degree
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 Channel H.264 Security Surveillance DVR Digital Video Recorder System with 1500GB Hard Drive, 8 Built-in SONY Effio CCD Day Night IR Outdoor Security Cameras, 8 Pack Video Power Cables, 8 Camera Power Supplies CPB
